scripts.dev:cjs: tsup src/index.ts --target es2020 --sourcemap --no-splitting --ignore-watch "**/*.generated.ts" --format esm,cjs --clean --watch src --onSuccess "node dist/index.js"
scripts.dev:mjs: tsup src/index.ts --target es2020 --sourcemap --no-splitting --ignore-watch "**/*.generated.ts" --format esm,cjs --clean --watch src --onSuccess "node dist/index.mjs"
